name: Mr. Robot: Junior Edition
overview: A Junior edition, (für Kinder) of the 1984 Mr. Robot and his Robot Factory game. Dear little Dwarfs, Enjoy this fabulous game from 1984 without any pressure. jump and collect as much as you want! Avoid fire and deep falls. You can choose the Junior Edition or the original when you are ready. You can skip levels and pause the game. Warning: on nice days go play outside.
